content:
Yoohaanone! Nin perunnaall kee-rtthichon dhanyan
Santaanangallumotthu sabha stho-thram chollunnu
Elishubaayude udaratthil tha-nne ethirelpaan
Kaatthu vasichavanaam ninne a-nne maanichaan,
Ammayodotthaagathanaayitthan-sthhaanaapathiyaayu
Ninne theerttha paraakramanil nee-aamodichu.
Eliyaa thannaathmaavum vee-ryavumullllone!
Naathhanu maargam nannaakkaan nee-preshithanaayi
Kartthaavin raajyaagamanam shoonyaaranyatthil
Udghoshichaagathare nee aa-hvaanam cheythu.
Garbhatthiltthanne ninne ka-rtthan nernnettu
Undaayavaril shreshdhan nee e-nnudghoshichaan.
Kandaalum daivatthinte ku-nyaadennevam
Rakshakane nee saakshichaan martthyanmaar maddhye.
